song_name: What the World Needs Now Is Love
metrics_conclusion: What the World Needs Now Is Love has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion:
What the World Needs Now Is Love is written in the key of B♭ Minor.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 11st most popular key among Minor keys and     the 23rd most popular  among all keys. Minor keys, along with major keys, are a common choice for popular music.  The three most important chords, built off the 1st, 4th and 5th scale degrees are all minor chords (B♭ minor, E♭ minor, and F minor).

See the B♭ Minor Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
